content:
During his official visit to Bucharest, the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Lithuanian Republic, Gabrielus Landsbergis, met with his colleague from Romania Ms. Luminitsa Sobesk and discuss the situation in Ukraine.

About thisreportedLithuanian Foreign Minister.

“Another opportunity to discuss the situation in Ukraine with my Romanian colleague Luminitsa SobeskaBeing here in Bucharest, ”Gabrielus Landsbergis said.

As reportedArmyinform, Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Lithuania Gabrielus Landsbergis noted that, unfortunately, some international partners lack political will to provide Ukraine with the necessary assistance to win.

Also LithuaniacalledThe countries of the North Atlantic Alliance give Ukraine all possible weapons needed to achieve victory over Russia.
title: Lithuanian and Romania foreign ministers to discuss the situation in Ukraine
